name: Viking-Dash
description:
A terrible threat hangs on the northern plains, the trolls are back.
With such danger lurking nearby, venturing out can be tricky and if you don't watch your step, who knows where you'll end up..
But that is without counting on our brave and grumpy viking, Skuld !
And he's ready to knock heads with his ennemies ..

Viking Dash is a new unique platform game in which you must reach and defeat your ennemies by using precise, quick and strategic « dashes ».
But be careful, the amount of dashes is limited !
Use the explosive crates and the ropes to get about a rich universe of 40 levels and more to come !
Get the highest scores to unlock all the characters.

Game optimized on Iphone 5 and up.
Game optimized on Ipad 2nd generation and up.
